title: What guildmaster/ admin corruption have you seen so so far on Ruqqus?

author.bio: Stop reading my bio you pervert.

body: None yet. A few people whining about how some mod removed their post, but those are mostly the morons deliberately spreading childish racist bs and then playing victim to make Ruqqus look bad. You know how they are.

post.title: What guildmaster/ admin corruption have you seen so so far on Ruqqus?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Not really any yet. The only actual evil I've seen is now when anyone besides one of the discord mods makes a suggestion to the admins related to how Ruqqus is run or asks a question about it they get mad and say "it's not your job to tell us your opinion". This is mostly only true for how the site is moderated and managed, as the admins still happily take suggestions for other new features.

There's flaws in the system for sure, but I haven't seen any real corruption. Reddit on the other hand....
body_html:
Not really any yet. The only actual evil I've seen is now when anyone besides one of the discord mods makes a suggestion to the admins related to how Ruqqus is run or asks a question about it they get mad and say "it's not your job to tell us your opinion". This is mostly only true for how the site is moderated and managed, as the admins still happily take suggestions for other new features.

There's flaws in the system for sure, but I haven't seen any real corruption. Reddit on the other hand....

post.title: What guildmaster/ admin corruption have you seen so so far on Ruqqus?

author.bio: It was fun while it lasted, but this place has gone down the Alt-Reich shitter. So much potential wasted on another Voat. RIP Ruqqus. #JOJO2020
author.bio_html: It was fun while it lasted, but this place has gone down the Alt-Reich shitter. So much potential wasted on another Voat. RIP Ruqqus. #JOJO2020

body:
You talking about that ridiculous manifesto at the top of +Ruqqus right now? My favorite part is how his whole conspiracy theory boils down to one of two things on any of the points hes trying to make: 

1) Hes upset that features on the to-do list aren't implemented yet

2) hes mad that there ste mods and its not just the Dev Team running things, except for where it IS the Dev Team running things, in which case that's abuse of Admin powers

All of this is, of course, to enact a master evil scheme of implementing power mods and then selling off ruqqus for profit or something, and has nothing at all to do with the fact that this place was bulit from scratch by three ametuer devs working in their free time trying desperately to keep up with a user base thats suddenly and dramatically experiencing near exponential growth.

EDIT:. HA that was YOUR ridiculous manifesto. Well, now you know how i feel about the matter. Stop attributing inexperience and slowness to malice, dude.
body_html:
You talking about that ridiculous manifesto at the top of +Ruqqus right now? My favorite part is how his whole conspiracy theory boils down to one of two things on any of the points hes trying to make:

  1. Hes upset that features on the to-do list aren't implemented yet

  2. hes mad that there ste mods and its not just the Dev Team running things, except for where it IS the Dev Team running things, in which case that's abuse of Admin powers

All of this is, of course, to enact a master evil scheme of implementing power mods and then selling off ruqqus for profit or something, and has nothing at all to do with the fact that this place was bulit from scratch by three ametuer devs working in their free time trying desperately to keep up with a user base thats suddenly and dramatically experiencing near exponential growth.

EDIT:. HA that was YOUR ridiculous manifesto. Well, now you know how i feel about the matter. Stop attributing inexperience and slowness to malice, dude.

body:
Please actually read it before dismissing it as some crazy conspiracy theory, specifically this part:

> And before you stop reading, **no, I don't think the admins are a bunch of secret agents colluding with the mods to take over the world or some shit. Nothing evil is actually happening right now aside from possibly a bit of rudeness towards non-mods from the admins.** This is primarily a concern for what the future will hold if the flaws in the admins' current moderation system are not fixed.

Also I was the one in the thread disagreeing with people who said the admins were going to sell ruqqus for profit.
body_html:
Please actually read it before dismissing it as some crazy conspiracy theory, specifically this part:

And before you stop reading, no, I don't think the admins are a bunch of secret agents colluding with the mods to take over the world or some shit. Nothing evil is actually happening right now aside from possibly a bit of rudeness towards non-mods from the admins. This is primarily a concern for what the future will hold if the flaws in the admins' current moderation system are not fixed.

Also I was the one in the thread disagreeing with people who said the admins were going to sell ruqqus for profit.

body:
Eh. No, i don't think so. After about five paragraphs of ranting about things that would be obvious if you ever actually spent time in the Discord or talking to the devs i hit a numbered list, then a whole lot more manifesto after that, and stopped giving a shit. 

But enjoy your foil hat.

Eh. No, i don't think so. After about five paragraphs of ranting about things that would be obvious if you ever actually spent time in the Discord or talking to the devs i hit a numbered list, then a whole lot more manifesto after that, and stopped giving a shit.

But enjoy your foil hat.
